|brand = Fortinet |model = FortiGate |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -51E (FG-51E) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/07/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Fortinet_FortiGate-51E_(FG-51E) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SD-WAN Router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 19K-W13-6900R |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI (NOR) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX66L1G45GMI-10G; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- Ram speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K512M8DA-107:P; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1512; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 70:4C:A5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, mSATA |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = Molex (2-pin)
|serial = yes,, RJ-45 console,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, metal case, heat sink |addchip = Low Power 3-5V, 250kbps RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3232L;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC w/ PECI 3.0 Interface;Nuvoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C & SMBus I/O Expander w/ Interrupt Output;TI;TCA9555;;1;,,, 4.5-28V 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;TI;TPS54336A;;1;,,, 3A Dual Channel Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;TI;TPS54394;;2;,,, 5A Step-Down Regulator w/ Integrated Switcher;TI;TPS53316;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.99 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTM-320N |manuf_rev = V02 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07TK3M4BF |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Model: P17457-03", "FG-51E", "Fortinet, Inc", "19K-W13-6900R RoHs", :and "WRTM-320N_V02" are silkscreened on board.
OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-320N (V02)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 ''Armada 385'' :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.6GHz *Storage: 128MB SPI (NOR) Flash, :32GB mSATA SSD *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 7x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3A via 2-pin Molex
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.fortinet.com/content/dam/fortinet/assets/data-sheets/FortiGate_FortiWiFi_50E_Series.pdf Data Sheet] *[https://www.networkstraining.com/fortigate-comparison-30e-50e-60e/ ''Fortinet Fortigate 30E vs 50E/51E vs 60E/61E/60F'' on '''Networks Training''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/fortinet/fortinet_fortigate_51e |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa9 |arch = arm_cortex-a9_vfpv3 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
